name: bitd-alternate-sheets
description: Build scripts for the BitD alternate sheets CSS

scripts.metrics:styles: bash -lc 'scss_lines=$(find styles/scss -name "*.scss" ! -path "*/flexbox/*" -print0 | xargs -0 wc -l | awk "END{print $1}"); css_bytes=$(wc -c < styles/css/bitd-alt.css); echo "scss_lines=$scss_lines css_bytes=$css_bytes"'
